Name: Prelictor

Actions.Name: Catalogue
Actions.Effects: Part of foe's soul is ripped from their body and placed in free space in range 3 from them. The soul fragment is an intangible summon that can be passed through by other characters. A character can re-unite with their soul by ending their turn in or adjacent to its space. If they fail to do so by the end of their next turn, they take divine damage equal to 25% of their maximum hp and it dissipates.

Actions.Name: Quietus
Actions.Effects: Area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: Fear
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in range 6. While marked, that foe gains +1 curse on attacks and saves unless adjacent to an ally. If they end their turn adjacent to an ally, they can pass a save to clear this mark.

Actions.Name: Shriek
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 of the Prelictor or one of its summons of its choice must save or be forced to flee, shoving them 3 spaces in a direction of the Prelictor's choice, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Beckon
Actions.Description: Teleport all the Prelictor's summons 1 space, then deal 2 piercing damage to any foe adjacent to one of its summons.

Actions.Name: Yawning Void
Actions.Description: Summon a pit in a free space in range 3. Characters that end their turn in the pit can be teleported by the Prelictor to any other pit created by this ability.

PhasesDescription: When the Prelictor loses a total of 40 hp (and every 40 thereafter), it ignores any excess damage, then becomes intangible until the start of its next turn. It then summons a Minor Incarnate at any edge of the battlefield, targeting a player character. A new player character must be chosen each time.

Actions.Name: Detonate Dead
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 of the Prelictor or one of its summons of its choice must save or be forced to flee, shoving them 3 spaces in a direction of the Prelictor's choice, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Unholy Vigor
Actions.Description: The Prelictor gains +2 actions this turn. Quietus can be used again this turn.

Actions.Name: Sever Life's Thread
Actions.Description: All foes take damage equal to 100% of their maximum hp.
